about_the_game:
Blocktopia is not just a city-building game; it’s a chaotic adventure! In this world, chickens, cows, sheep… they’re all actually tiny dinosaurs! Yes, you heard that right! Every animal in the city can be a cute, tiny creature one moment and transform into a colossal monster the next. Sometimes adorable, sometimes destructive—nothing is as it seems!  

Every villager has a unique personality. Some are calm and hardworking, while others are outright wild! While building your city, a builder’s life might turn into a heroic tale, or your town could face an attack from a giant chicken!  

But remember, anything can change! Giants, wizards, or strange creatures might be lurking around the corner. You never know what’s coming because in the world of Blocktopia, everything can turn upside down in an instant. It’s not just about managing resources and building a city; get ready for a constant explosion of comedy and chaos!  

Key Features

  • Click, Gather, Expand: Collect resources quickly, build new structures, and grow your city. Create a fast-changing world with clicker-based mechanics!  

  • Fight in FPS Mode: Don’t just manage the city—defend it in chaotic FPS battles! Protect your town from relentless raids and survive the onslaught.  

  • Chaos and Diplomacy: Choose your path! Build your city with peace or rule as a dictator and conquer neighboring kingdoms. Whether it’s diplomacy or chaos, your leadership style defines the game.  

  • Deliver Justice: Set up the gallows and punish criminals! Choose between two suspects, but be careful—it’s hard to find the guilty one, and you might end up hanging the wrong person!  

  • Vibrant Graphics and a Dynamic World: Enjoy colorful graphics filled with surprises at every turn. With a day-night cycle and changing seasons, your city will constantly evolve.

      

  • Animals Are Dinosaurs: Every animal in this world is actually a tiny dinosaur. Sometimes they’re cute, sometimes they’re giant and destructive! Nothing is as it seems!  

  • Character-Driven Lives: Get to know your villagers, interact with them, and witness your city’s growth while experiencing absurd love stories along the way! 

  • Daily Events and Surprises: Keep your town lively with daily surprises, social interactions, and special festivals. Expect a chaotic, colorful, and fun-filled life!  

Game Features

  • FPS combat and city defense  

  • Fun clicker and resource management mechanics  

  • Choose between chaos and diplomacy  

  • Punish criminals with gallows!  

  • Every animal is secretly a dinosaur  

  • Vibrant, adorable graphics  

  • Dynamic day-night cycle and seasonal changes  

  • Character-driven city life and interactions  

  • High fun, low stress!

name: Blocktopia
short_description: Blocktopia is a vibrant and humorous clicker city-builder game. Gather resources, build your town, and defend it against nightly raids! In this chaotic world where justice prevails, survive and dive into a fun city-building experience!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Japanese, Norwegian, Turkish, Swedish
